means: 转折点，重大的抉择时刻

sentence.Network_en: He came to a halt at a crossroads fifty yards further on.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在往前50码远的十字路口停了下来。

sentence.Network_en: Mrs Glick reined in the horse and stopped at the crossroads.
sentence.Network_cn: 格利克夫人勒住缰绳在十字路口停了下来。

sentence.Network_en: Turn left at the crossroads into Clay Lane.
sentence.Network_cn: 十字路口左转进克雷巷。

entry.def: A crossroads is a place where two roads meet and cross each other.

example.ex: Turn right at the first crossroads.
example.tran: 在第一个十字路口向右转。

entry.def: If you say that something is at a crossroads, you mean that it has reached a very important stage in its development where it could go one way or another.

example.ex: The company was clearly at a crossroads...
example.tran: 该公司显然处于发展的关键时刻。

example.ex: They had reached a crossroads in their relationship.
example.tran: 他们的关系发展到了关键阶段。

entry.def: A crossroads is an important or central place.

example.ex: ...Mulberry, a small town at the crossroads of agriculture in central Florida.
example.tran: 马尔伯里，一个位于佛罗里达州中部农业集中区的小镇

means.word_mean: 1. a community of people smaller than a village
2. a crisis situation or point in time when a critical decision must be made;

sentences.sentence: "at that juncture he had no idea what to do"
"he must be made to realize that the company stands at a critical point"

means.word_mean: 3. a point where a choice must be made;

sentences.sentence: "Freud's work stands at the crossroads between psychology and neurology"

auth_sentence.content: The British Isles are at the crossroads of European weather.
auth_sentence.res_content: The British Isles are at the crossroads of European weather.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The British Isles are at the crossroads of European weather.

auth_sentence.content: Which brings us back to the idea of the crossroads.
auth_sentence.res_content: Which brings us back to the idea of the crossroads.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Which brings us back to the idea of the crossroads.

auth_sentence.content: Europe now finds itself at a difficult crossroads.
auth_sentence.res_content: Europe now finds itself at a difficult crossroads.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Europe now finds itself at a difficult crossroads.

Sentence.sentence: Why didn't you stop when we first signaled you at the crossroads?
Why didn't you stop when we first signaled you at the crossroads?

sentences.en: I’ll stop for you at the crossroads.
Take a right turn at the crossroads.
The traffic policeman took his stand at the crossroads.
sentences.cn: 交通警察在十字路口站岗。

sentences.en: Our army stole a march on the enemy and reached the crossroads an hour ahead of them.
sentences.cn: 我军偷偷地抢在敌军前面行动,比他们早一小时到达十字路口。

means.word_mean: 转折点;重大的抉择时刻

sentences.en: He had reached a crossroads in his career.
sentences.cn: 他的事业发展到了一个十字路口。

means.word_mean: 处于关键时刻；在紧要关头

sentences.en: We are standing at an important crossroads in the history of Europe.
sentences.cn: 我们正处于欧洲历史上一个重要的转捩点。

sentences.en: He’s at a crossroads in his career—either he stays in his current job and waits for promotion, or he accepts this new post in Brazil.
sentences.cn: 他的事业正处在紧要关头，要么继续干目前的工作，等着升职，要么就接受巴西的新工作。
